Assail.card_desc: [In Pursuit] Activating In Pursuit generates {scale=2|2} ammo.

Commencement.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Increase the distance of Combat Slide by {scale=10|10}%

Compel.card_desc: [In Pursuit] Reduce the Cooldown of In Pursuit by {scale=1|1}s.

Death Hastens.card_desc: [Weapon] Your Weapon deals 680 damage, but fires more slowly and has a reduced ammo count.

Discovery.card_desc: [Retribution] Deal 30% more damage to your Retribution target and reduce the Cooldown of Retribution by 15s.

Fortitude.card_desc: [In Pursuit] Every shot hit with In Pursuit heals you for {scale=25|25} Health.

Hardiness.card_desc: [In Pursuit] Gain {scale=5|5}% Damage Reduction during In Pursuit.

Heroism.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Gain 90% Damage Reduction and CC Immunity while using Combat Slide.

Inescapable.card_desc: [Retribution] You gain {scale=5|5}% Movement Speed when you are within 60 units of your Retribution target.

Justice Served.card_desc: [Retribution] Killing your target refills {scale=15|15}% of your maximum Health.

Keen Sight.card_desc: [Retribution] Increase the range at which your target becomes visible by {scale=10|10} units.

Requip.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Activating Combat Slide generates {scale=1|1} Ammo.

The Hunted.card_desc: [Retribution] You gain {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal against your Retribution target.

Warrants Out.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Gain {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 2s after Combat Slide ends.

Wicked Don't Rest.card_desc: [Combat Slide] Hitting an enemy reduces the Cooldown of Combat Slide by {scale=5|5}%

Angriffslustig.card_desc: [Hetzjagd] Die Aktivierung von Hetzjagd erzeugt {scale=2|2} Munition.

Dienstantritt.card_desc: [Gefechtrutschen] Erhöht die Weite von Gefechtrutschen um {scale=10|10}%.

Entdeckung.card_desc: [Vergeltung] Du fügst deinem Vergeltungs-Ziel 30% mehr Schaden zu und die Abklingzeit von Vergeltung wird um 15s reduziert.

Flinke Stiefel.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Heldentum.card_desc: [Gefechtrutschen] Während Gefechtrutschen wird erlittener Schaden um 90% reduziert und du erhältst CC-Immunität.

Kopfnuss.card_desc: [Gefechtrutschen] Waffentreffer reduzieren die Abklingzeit von Gefechtrutschen um {scale=5|5}%.

Nachschub.card_desc: [Gefechtrutschen] Die Aktivierung von Gefechtrutschen erzeugt {scale=1|1} Munition.

N\u00f6tigung.card_desc: [Hetzjagd] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Hetzjagd um {scale=1|1}s.

Rechtspflege.card_desc: [Vergeltung] Tötest du dein Ziel, wirst du um {scale=15|15}% deiner maximalen Gesundheit geheilt.

Schneller Tod.card_desc: [Waffe] Deine Waffenschüsse verursachen je 680 Schaden, werden aber langsamer abgefeuert und die Magazinkapazität wird reduziert.

Tapferkeit.card_desc: [Hetzjagd] Für jeden Treffer mit Hetzjagd wirst du {scale=25|25} LP geheilt.

Tempobefugnis.card_desc: [Gefechtrutschen] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach dem Ende von Gefechtrutschen 2s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Unentrinnbar.card_desc: [Vergeltung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo im Radius von 60 Einheiten um dein Vergeltungs-Ziel um {scale=5|5}%.

Weitsicht.card_desc: [Vergeltung] Erhöht die Entfernung, in der dein Ziel sichtbar wird, um {scale=10|10} Einheiten.

Z\u00e4higkeit.card_desc: [Hetzjagd] Während Hetzjagd wird erlittener Schaden um {scale=5|5}% reduziert.

Bien huil\u00e9.card_desc: [Arme] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=5|5}%.

D\u00e9position.card_desc: [Glissade] La distance de Glissade augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Force d'\u00e2me.card_desc: [Poursuite] Chaque tir réussi de Poursuite vous rend {scale=25|25} PV.

Fugitif.card_desc: [Châtiment] Vous avez {scale=10|10} de drain de vie contre la cible de Châtiment.

H\u00e9ro\u00efsme.card_desc: [Glissade] Pendant Glissade, vous subissez 90% de dégâts en moins et vous êtes immunisé aux contrôles.

In\u00e9luctable.card_desc: [Châtiment] Quand vous êtes à moins de 60 unités de la cible de Châtiment, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=5|5}%.

Le Mal ne dort jamais.card_desc: [Glissade] Toucher un ennemi réduit le temps de recharge de Glissade de {scale=5|5}%.

Mandat d'arr\u00eat.card_desc: [Glissade] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}% pendant 2s après Glissade.

Mesures d'instruction.card_desc: [Châtiment] Châtiment se recharge 15s plus vite et vous infligez 30% de dégâts supplémentaires à la cible.

Mort pr\u00e9cipit\u00e9e.card_desc: [Arme] Les Magnums infligent 680 dégâts mais leur cadence de tir diminue et ils ont moins de munitions.

Regard per\u00e7ant.card_desc: [Châtiment] La distance à laquelle votre cible est visible augmente de {scale=10|10} unités.

Robustesse.card_desc: [Poursuite] Pendant Poursuite, vous subissez {scale=5|5}% de dégâts en moins.

Sentence.card_desc: [Châtiment] Exécuter la cible de Châtiment vous redonne {scale=15|15}% de vos PV max.

\u4f38\u5f20\u6b63\u4e49.card_desc: [审判] 击杀审判目标时回复{scale=15|15}%生命值

\u516c\u6b63\u5609\u5956.card_desc: [武器] 击败敌人或助攻时回复{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u521a\u6bc5.card_desc: [追捕到底] 技能每次命中敌人都将回复{scale=25|25}点生命值

\u5ba1\u8baf.card_desc: [追捕到底] 激活追捕到底时，回复{scale=2|2}发弹药

\u5f3a\u786c\u6001\u5ea6.card_desc: [追捕到底] 追捕到底期间,受到的所有伤害降低{scale=5|5}%

\u6b7b\u4ea1\u901f\u81f3.card_desc: [武器] 你的武器对生命值高于65%的敌人造成25%额外伤害。

\u6cd5\u5ead\u4f20\u5524.card_desc: [战斗滑铲] 战斗滑铲的距离提高{scale=10|10}%

\u6cd5\u773c.card_desc: [审判] 审判的追踪范围提高{scale=10|10}码

\u6cd5\u7f51\u6062\u6062.card_desc: [审判] 当你与审判目标的距离小于60码时，移动速度提升{scale=5|5}%

\u7f6a\u6076\u63ed\u53d1.card_desc: [审判] 对审判的目标造成30%额外伤害，审判的冷却时间也会降低15秒

\u82f1\u52c7\u6267\u6cd5.card_desc: [战斗滑铲] 战斗滑铲期间获得控制免疫效果，受到的伤害也会降低90%

\u901a\u7f09\u4ee4.card_desc: [审判] 攻击审判目标时获得{scale=10|10}%生命偷取

\u903c\u8feb.card_desc: [追捕到底] 追捕到底的冷却时间降低{scale=1|1}秒

\u90aa\u4e0d\u80dc\u6b63.card_desc: [战斗滑铲] 普通攻击命中敌人时，战斗滑铲的冷却时间降低{scale=5|5}%

\u91cd\u88c5\u4e0a\u9635.card_desc: [战斗滑铲] 使用战斗滑铲后获得{scale=1|1}发弹药

\u94c1\u8bc1\u5982\u5c71.card_desc: [战斗滑铲] 战斗滑铲结束后2秒内，移动速度提升{scale=10|10}%

Atormentador.card_desc: [Revancha] Obtienes un {scale=10|10}% de robo de vida contra tu objetivo de Revancha.

Botas fracturadoras.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumentas tu salud máxima en {scale=50|50} PS.

Comienzo.card_desc: [Deslizamiento de combate] Aumenta la distancia de Deslizamiento de combate un {scale=10|10}%.

Condicionado.card_desc: [Armadura] Ganas un {scale=3|3}% de velocidad de movimiento.

Descubrimiento.card_desc: [Revancha] Inflige un 30% más de daño al objetivo de Revancha y reduce su recarga en 15s.

Fortaleza.card_desc: [Persecución] Tras alcanzar a un enemigo durante Persecución te curas {scale=25|25} PS.

Hero\u00edsmo.card_desc: [Deslizamiento de combate] Obtienes 90% de reducción de daño e inmunidad al CM mientras usas Deslizamiento de combate.

Imponer.card_desc: [Persecución] Se reduce la recarga de Persecución en {scale=1|1} s.

Inevitable.card_desc: [Revancha] Ganas un {scale=5|5}% de velocidad de movimiento cuando estás en un rango de 60 unidades del objetivo de Revancha.

Irrupci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Persecución] Recuperas {scale=2|2} de munición al activar Persecución.

Justicia cumplida.card_desc: [Revancha] Eliminar a tu objetivo rellena un {scale=15|15}% de tu salud máxima.

La muerte se acerca.card_desc: [Arma] Tu arma inflige 680 PS de daño, pero dispara más despacio y tiene menos munición.

Los indignos no descansan.card_desc: [Deslizamiento de combate] Al acertar un tiro a un enemigo, la recarga de Deslizamiento de combate se reduce un {scale=5|5}%..

Orden fuera.card_desc: [Deslizamiento de combate] Ganas un {scale=10|10}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 2s después de que termine Deslizamiento de combate.

Re-equipar.card_desc: [Deslizamiento de combate] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición al activar Deslizamiento de combate.

Reponer.card_desc: [Arma] Las bajas y eliminaciones generan {scale=1|1} de munición.

Vista sagaz.card_desc: [Revancha] Aumenta el rango en cual tu objetivo de Revancha es visible en {scale=10|10}.

Apressando a Morte.card_desc: [Arma] Sua arma causa 680 de dano, mas dispara mais devagar e tem menos munição.

Botas Leves.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Coa\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Perseguição] Reduz o intervalo de Perseguição em {scale=1|1}s.

Descoberta.card_desc: [Retribuição] Você causa 30% a mais de dano ao alvo da sua Retribuição e reduz em 15s o intervalo da Retribuição.

\u00c9 S\u00f3 o Come\u00e7o.card_desc: [Ofensiva] Aumenta a distância da Ofensiva em {scale=10|10}%.

Hero\u00edsmo.card_desc: [Ofensiva] Ganha 90% de redução de dano e imunidade a controle coletivo quando usar a Ofensiva.

Inescap\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Retribuição] Você ganha {scale=5|5}% mais velocidade de movimento quando estiver a 60 unidades do alvo da Retribuição.

Justi\u00e7a seja feita.card_desc: [Retribuição] Matar seu alvo da Retribuição recupera {scale=15|15}% da sua vida máxima.

Mandado de Busca.card_desc: [Ofensiva] Ganha {scale=10|10}% de velocidade de movimento por 2s depois da Ofensiva acabar.

O Perseguido.card_desc: [Retribuição] Você ganha {scale=10|10}% de roubo de vida contra o seu alvo da Retribuição.

Perseveran\u00e7a.card_desc: [Perseguição] Ganha {scale=5|5}% de redução de dano durante Perseguição.

Reequipado.card_desc: [Ofensiva] Ativar a Ofensiva gera {scale=1|1} de munição.

Sem Tr\u00e9gua.card_desc: [Ofensiva] Acertar um inimigo diminui o intervalo da Ofensiva em {scale=5|5}%

Tenacidade.card_desc: [Perseguição] Cada tiro acertado durante Perseguição cura {scale=25|25} de vida.

Vis\u00e3o Afiada.card_desc: [Retribuição] Aumenta em {scale=10|10} unidades a distância na qual seus inimigos ficam visíveis.

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Оружие наносит 680 ед. урона, но стреляет медленнее, и его боезапас уменьшается.

\u0413\u0435\u0440\u043e\u0438\u0437\u04.card_desc: [Боевой подкат] Во время использования Боевого подката вы получаете на 90% меньше урона и иммунитет к эффектам контроля.

\u0413\u0440\u0435\u0448\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Боевой подкат] Попадание по врагу сокращает перезарядку Боевого подката на {scale=5|5}%.

\u0416\u0435\u0440\u0442\u0432\u0430.card_desc: [Кара] Вы получаете {scale=10|10}% вампиризма против цели Кары.

\u041d\u0430\u0447\u0430\u043b\u043e.card_desc: [Боевой подкат] Дальность Боевого подката увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u041d\u0435\u0438\u0437\u0431\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Кара] Если цель Кары находится в радиусе 60 ед. от вас, ваша скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=5|5}%.

\u041e\u0440\u0434\u0435\u0440 \u043d\u0.card_desc: [Боевой подкат] После Боевого подката ваша скорость передвижения увеличивается на {scale=10|10}% на 2 с.

\u041e\u0441\u0442\u0440\u043e\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Кара] Радиус видимости цели увеличивается на {scale=10|10} метров.

\u041e\u0442\u043a\u0440\u044b\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Кара] Вы наносите цели, отмеченной Карой, на 30% больше урона. Перезарядка Кары сокращается на 15 с.

\u041f\u0435\u0440\u0435\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Боевой подкат] Активация Боевого подката генерирует {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041f\u043e\u043f\u043e\u043b\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Убийства и устранения генерируют {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041f\u0440\u0430\u0432\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Кара] Убийство цели восстанавливает {scale=15|15}% от максимального здоровья.

\u0421\u0430\u043f\u043e\u0433\u0438 \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье увеличивается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u0421\u0442\u043e\u0439\u043a\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Погоня] Во время действия Погони вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% меньше урона.

\u0425\u0440\u0430\u0431\u0440\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Погоня] Каждое попадание по врагу во время Погони исцеляет вас на {scale=25|25} ед.

Bystry wzrok.card_desc: [Zemsta] Zwiększa zasięg wykrywania celu o {scale=10|10} jedn.

Grzeszni nie spoczn\u0105.card_desc: [Ślizg bojowy] Trafienie wroga skraca czas odnowienia Ślizgu bojowego o {scale=5|5}%.

Hart.card_desc: [Pościg] Każde trafienie w Pościgu przywraca {scale=25|25} PZ.

Heroizm.card_desc: [Ślizg bojowy] Zyskujesz 90% redukcji obrażeń i odporność na efekty kontroli tłumu podczas Ślizgu bojowego.

List go\u0144czy.card_desc: [Ślizg bojowy] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 2 s po zakończeniu Ślizgu.

Nieunikniony.card_desc: [Zemsta] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=5|5}% w odległości 60 jedn. od celu Zemsty.

Odkrycie.card_desc: [Zemsta] Zadaje 30% więcej obrażeń celowi Zemsty i zmniejsza jej czas odnowienia o 15 s.

Pocz\u0105tek.card_desc: [Ślizg bojowy] Zwiększa zasięg Ślizgu bojowego o {scale=10|10}%.

Szybkie buty.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

W po\u015bcigu.card_desc: [Zemsta] Przyznaje {scale=10|10}% kradzieży życia przeciw celowi Zemsty.

Wymierzona kara.card_desc: [Zemsta] Zabicie celu przywraca {scale=15|15}% twoich maks. PZ.

Wymuszenie.card_desc: [Pościg] Skraca czas odnowienia Pościgu o {scale=1|1} s.

Zaopatrzenie.card_desc: [Ślizg bojowy] Aktywacja Ślizgu bojowego generuje {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Zapasy.card_desc: [Broń] Zabójstwa i eliminacje generują {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Zbli\u017ca si\u0119 \u015bmier\u0107.card_desc: [Broń] Twoja broń zadaje 680 obrażeń, ale wolniej strzela i ma zmniejszony magazynek.

Adalet Sa\u011fland\u0131.card_desc: [Cezalandırma] Hedefini katlettiğinde maksimum Canının %{scale=15|15} kadarı yenilenir.

Avlanan.card_desc: [Cezalandırma] Cezalandırma hedefine karşı %{scale=10|10} Can Çalma kazanırsın.

Cesaret.card_desc: [Takipte] Takipte ile yapılan her vuruş seni {scale=25|25} Can iyileştirir.

G\u00f6z\u00fc Keskin.card_desc: [Cezalandırma] Hedefinin açığa çıkma menzilini {scale=10|10} birim artır.

H\u0131zl\u0131 \u00d6l\u00fcm.card_desc: [Silah] Silahın 680 hasar verir ancak daha yavaş ateşler ve cephane sayısı azalır.

Ka\u00e7\u0131n\u0131lmaz.card_desc: [Cezalandırma] Cezalandırma hedefinin 60 birim yakınında olduğunda %{scale=5|5} Hareket Hızı kazanırsın.

Kahramanl\u0131k.card_desc: [İleri Kayma] İleri Kayma kullanırken %90 Hasar Azaltma ve KK Bağışıklığı kazan.

Ke\u015fif.card_desc: [Cezalandırma] Cezalandırma'yı kullandığın hedefe %30 daha fazla hasar ver ve Cezalandırma'nın Bekleme Süresini 15 sn azalt.

K\u00f6t\u00fcler Dinlenmez.card_desc: [İleri Kayma] Bir düşmanı vurmak İleri Kayma'nın Bekleme Süresini %{scale=5|5} azaltır.

Tutuklama Emri.card_desc: [İleri Kayma] İleri Kayma bittikten sonra 2 saniye boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Yeniden Ku\u015fan.card_desc: [İleri Kayma] İleri Kayma'yı etkinleştirmek {scale=1|1} Cephane oluşturur.

Yeniden Stokla.card_desc: [Silah] Katletmeler ve Saf Dışı Bırakmalar {scale=1|1} cephane oluşturur.
